item.title: Pence says he opposes RFK Jr.â€™s nomination for HHS secretary because of his stance on abortion
item.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence said he opposes Robert F. Kennedy, Jr.'s nomination for the Department of Health and Human Services secretary.

item.title: Democrat wins House race to retain seat in California's 21st district
item.description: Democratic Rep. Jim Costa was re-elected to serve another term in California's 21st Congressional District after over a week of counting ballots.

item.title: Moderate Democrat and Marine veteran wins re-election in Trump leaning congressional district
item.description: The Associated Press projects that Democrat Rep. Jared Golden will win re-election in Maine's 2nd Congressional District, a red-leaning district in an...

item.title: Trump picks Karoline Leavitt to serve as White House press secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has chosen Karoline Leavitt to serve as White House press secretary for his upcoming administration.
